1.content: first off we have to create your character and what happened at the end of the game.
1.title: the beggining

11.content: first off we have to create your character and what happened at the end of the game.
11.title: male

111.content: Now what happened at the end of the game?
111.title: wizard

choices: free the other circles of Magi.
take a few weeks off it's been tough on everyone.
1112.content:
good now that all that's out of the way let's get started.

As Hawk walked out of the gallows he saw his friends Merill, Fenris, Aveline, Varric, Isabela, Sebastion,Anders and his brother Carver all standing over Merideths body he walked over to her body knelt down and tried to feel a pulse. He couldn't find one and he declared her dead and a smile broke across his face as he turned to his friends and said "good job everyone."


         Later at the Hanged man Varric walked up to Hawke and asked "what are you going to do now Hawke? you just killed the knight commander and set over one hundered wizards free. what could you possibly do next?"

"well Varric I planned on ______" he said with a smile on his face.
1112.title: wizard ending

11121.content:
"What?!" sputtered Varric through his beer. "you're joking right?"
"Of course Varric. If I don't then who will stand up for them? the Templars? admittedly most of them aren't so bad but I'm going to try something new with the circles. I was thinking what if we had a mage to watch the templars and a templar to watch the mages it might be better." responded Hawke.
"You my friend are crazy." said Varric chuckling a little.
"Maybe but I think of it as a good crazy."
"so" taking a swig from his beer Varric said "when are we leaving?"
11121.title: free the other circles of Magi.

111211.content:
"soon my good friend. But first I need to take care of some stuff." said Hawke. "But first I'll finish this beer."

___________________________________
The next day Hawke was walking along the streets of Kirkwall looking for the things he would need for his revolution. He already had the support of the Mages of the city and most of the Nobles of the city, those he didn't have just didn't care about anything other than money. He soon found his way to the docks where he would hire a ship when he saw to his surprise Isabella! he quickly ran up to her and said "Hello Isabella what are you still doing here I thought you'd already left."
"No not yet Hawke, I was just trying to find a crew for my ship." said Isabella.
"When you finally do leave let me know would you?"
"Of course Hawke, to think I'd leave without saying good bye to m best friend in the whole city." Hawke then proceeded to tell Isabella about his plan to free the circles. How did she react?
111211.title: soon

111212.content:
"next week." Hawke said.
Varric takes another swig "Alrighty then Hawke see you tomorrow." he then falls asleep. you finish your drink and think you'll stop by your best friend's house.
111212.title: next week

11121211.content:
As you started walking to Fenris's mansion you started thinking of how he had been imprisoned by his old mage master and was then given his magical powers which he despised. You knocked on the door and entered. Fenris walked out to greet you.
"Hello Hawke." Fenris said.
"Hello Fenris. I've had an Idea I thought we might go and try to teach the other circles of magi how to govern themselves without resorting to blood magic what do you say want to come?"
"Hawke you know I'd follow you to the end of the time. of course I'd help you."
"great thank you Fenris this means alot to me."
"listen Hawke before you go I was wondering if you'd like to maybe stay awhile and give me a hand with something."
11121211.title: Fenris

11121222.content: which one? (sorry it took so long to get to Aveline)
11121222.title: Isabela/aveline

info.brief_description: the epilogue of dragon age 2 made by fans
info.description:
This is a fan story of the new game dragon age 2 we will explore what happened after the champion of Kirkwall left his/her city with his/her friends.

the golden rule
when adding to this story please try to use good grammar
